title: Data Analyst
content:
Thinkific is a software platform that gives anyone the ability to easily create and sell online courses, build vibrant communities, and monetize memberships. We believe in impactful and innovative work: our team of 250+ Thinkers is building and expanding an incredible product that empowers Creator Educators and businesses around the globe while working collaboratively to learn, grow, and succeed together. Join us to see how weâ€™re building one of the best workplaces in Canadian tech!
We believe every candidate should have a fair, inclusive, and overall great experience when exploring a new role with Thinkific. That starts with outlining our hiring process so you know what to expect every step of the wayâ€”click here to learn more: https://thnk.cc/whattoexpectAre you adept at crafting data models that provide deep business insights and support strategic decision-making? Weâ€™re looking for a Data Analyst to join us at Thinkific.
As a Data Analyst at Thinkific, youâ€™ll provide valuable data expertise to our Research & Development and Go-to-Market teams to support impactful projects and strategic initiatives. Reporting to the Analytics Manager, you'll step into a role where quick thinking meets deep analysis, shaping decisions that drive our business forward. Our team thrives on engaging discussions, thoughtful retrospectives, and semi-annual summits that spark creativity. 
Your goal will be to deliver business insights through data. Hereâ€™s how youâ€™ll accomplish this: 
Dive into our wealth of customer data to provide narratives that not only describe our current performance but also recommend clear, actionable steps for growth. Your insights will be pivotal in shaping the direction of our product and marketing strategies
Develop comprehensive data models that serve as the foundation for self-service analytics
Create tools in our BI platforms that empower stakeholders to extract and analyze data independently, ensuring they have the information they need at their fingertips
Provide general data support, and be the go-to expert for data inquiries at Thinkific, particularly supporting real-time data needs through tools like Looker and Mixpanel
Offer thought leadership by applying your expertise to help solve complex business challenges. You'll use data-backed reasoning to guide strategic discussions, fostering a culture where data informs all tiers of decision-making
The person we have in mind likely:
Has 3+ years of hands-on experience in data analysis, with a proven track record of developing data models and delivering insights that drive business growth
Proficient in SQL, Excel, and BI tools like Looker, with the ability to translate data findings into compelling stories for a non-technical audience
Has a collaborative approach to stakeholder engagement, ensuring that data practices align with business needs and contribute to informed decision-making
Possesses an understanding of A/B testing, and a keen interest in continually advancing their data analysis capabilities
Loves to learn and grow. Theyâ€™ve found (and keep looking for) ways to level up their skills in this field, whether thatâ€™s through formal education, gaining professional experience, or maybe even building their own business 
These things would also be nice, but we think you could learn them on the job: 
Familiarity with SaaS metrics, customer journey analytics, and a desire to deepen your expertise in product and marketing analytics
Experience with a modern data stack, including tools like dbt, Amplitude, Mixpanel, LookML, and BigQuery ML
Comfort with JIRA and data scripting in Python or R
The recruitment compensation range for this position is $97,000-$120,000 CAD
Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging & Accessibility
This is just our initial idea of who weâ€™re looking for! At Thinkific, we know that people have unique career journeys. If your experience is close to what weâ€™ve described but you feel that you might be missing a few of the requirements, please still apply! We believe in equal opportunity and are committed to diversity, equity, inclusion and belonging across every facet of our business.
Weâ€™re also committed to providing a comfortable and accessible interview experience for every candidate. If there are any accommodations our team can make throughout our hiring process (big or small), please let us know.   
What you can expect if you join Thinkific:
An amazing team of talented, passionate, and kind Thinkers. Together, weâ€™ve built an amazing cultureâ€”weâ€™re one of Canada's Top Small & Medium Employers!
The chance to build, improve, and innovate on a platform thatâ€™s driving positive impactâ€”we already support 50,000+ active creators in over 165 countries.
A competitive compensation package. This includes your base salary, equity, and an Employee Share Purchase Plan, on top of some great perks. 
Comprehensive benefits starting on Day 1. We have health, vision, and dental coverage for you and your family, plus $3000 for mental health care and a health or personal spending account.
A flexible work environmentâ€”choose to work from home, at our Vancouver HQ, a co-working space, or anywhere thereâ€™s wifi for a change of scenery. 
An open vacation policy and flexible work environment. Our team takes a minimum of 4 weeks vacation each year and makes work fit into their lives (not the other way around).
Career growth. We put an emphasis on your development with our annual $1500 USD Learn and Grow fund, training, mentorship, coaching, and internal promotion opportunities.
A home office setup. Youâ€™ll be ready to succeed with a company-owned Macbook Pro and a budget to get a desk, chair, or any accessories to help you work comfortably and productively. 
Generous parental leave top-ups for up to 32 weeks, as well as fertility coverage through our group benefits plan.
A place where you can bring your whole self to work. We know that different perspectives lead to amazing ideas, more innovation, and, ultimately, our success as a company. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, identities, and statuses. Whoever you areâ€”we can't wait to meet you!

demographic_questions.description:
Part of Thinkific’s Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging mission is to focus on inclusive hiring practices. At Thinkific, we Strive for Equality every day - it’s one of our core values! We continuously seek out and attract a wealth of experiences and perspectives, and we invite you to complete this optional survey to help us understand and evaluate our efforts. 

All information will be kept confidential, will only be used for the sole purpose of evaluating our diversity and inclusion hiring practices, and will be kept separate from your name and application. Thank you for your participation!

questions.description: Our goal is to better understand your story in order to see the full picture. No judgments here—we are guided by our company values of Strive for Equality and Choose Ethics and Integrity to provide each candidate with an equal opportunity to be successful.
questions.label: Have you had a lot of short stints? Taken a break to travel or pursue another passion? If thereâ€™s anything you want to clarify about your previous experience or gaps in your resume, let us know here!
